description.translate: Bad omens arise, when fate strikes the luckiest....

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Bottes inquiétantes\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§aMauvais augures surviennent,\"}","{\"text\":\"§aquand le destin frappe les plus chanceux...\"}","{\"text\":\"§aBad omens arise, when\"}","{\"text\":\"§afate strikes the luckiest....\"}","{\"text\":\"§7SPD§a2 §7LUC§a1 §7HER§c-1\"}"],color:460551}}
